alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 3:23PM EDT until May 31 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 222 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Point Baker, or 8 miles northwest of Milton, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Point Baker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
